name: Ahros: One Warrior Chronicle
description:
Ahros: One Warrior Chronicle is an adventure VR-game that tells about a way of a young warrior, which is to restore peace and order in a world destroyed by global war.

In this game, the story is told through a series of tasks that character performs with the help of:
- Dragons
- Stationary and mobile turrets
- Various mechanisms
- The character himself

Join our @4ilab Twitter to see more news and updates.
